name: Homeowner Counseling
description: We offer Post-purchase Workshops and One-on-One Housing Counseling to help homeowners succeed after purchasing their home. Home ownership becomes more sustainable with our Post-purchase counseling and resulted in significant reductions in delinquencies and foreclosures.
fullDescription: We offer Post-purchase Workshops and One-on-One Housing Counseling to help homeowners succeed after purchasing their home. Home ownership becomes more sustainable with our Post-purchase counseling and resulted in significant reductions in delinquencies and foreclosures.
